contexts.context: ...and asked him one day: "So no rotting <mark>apples</mark> in the desk drawer?" "No, no rotting apples...
...apples in the desk drawer?" "No, no rotting <mark>apples</mark> "And if you have an attack of the trots...
...color Till boisterous Fall When at each stammering gust <mark>Apples</mark> thump the ground.
